```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(pacman)
```

```{r}
p_load(zipcodeR)
# zip_code_db
real_codes <- with(zip_code_db, zipcode[!is.na(lat)])
length(real_codes)
```

```{r}
p_load(tictoc)
tic()
zz <- gzfile("zip-distances.csv.gz", "w")
for (aa in 2:length(real_codes)) {
  for (bb in 1:aa) {
    cat(aa, bb, zip_distance(aa,bb), sep=",", file=zz)
    cat("\n", file=zz)
  }
}
close(zz)
toc("Done")
```
